Package com.sait.ciaoToursEMS.controllers

Class EmployeeController

java.lang.Object
com.sait.ciaoToursEMS.controllers.EmployeeController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000", allowCredentials="true") @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/") public class EmployeeController extends Object
EmployeeController Handles all employee related requests such as creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving employees.
